Class Verb

java.lang.Object
unipd.edids.logicBusiness.entities.Word
unipd.edids.logicBusiness.entities.Verb
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigObserver, FileObserver
public class Verb extends Word implements ConfigObserver
The Verb class is responsible for managing and accessing a list of verbs loaded from a file, with support for dynamic updates to the file configuration.

Responsibilities: - Manages a list of verbs loaded from an external file. - Monitors configuration updates to adapt file references dynamically. - Supports verb conjugation via a pluggable strategy pattern. - Provides a Singleton instance to ensure a single point of access.

Design Patterns: - Singleton: Ensures only one instance of the class exists. - Strategy: Allows dynamic changes in the conjugation logic via TenseStrategy. - Observer: Responds to configuration changes for dynamic file management.

    • onConfigChange

      public void onConfigChange(String key, String value)
      Handles configuration changes for the Verb class, specifically updates the file path for loading adjectives.
      Specified by:
      onConfigChange in interface ConfigObserver
      Parameters:
      key - The configuration property that has changed.
      value - The new value of the changed configuration property.

    • getRandomWord

      public String getRandomWord()
      Returns a random verb from the list of verbs and applies the currently set conjugation strategy.
      Overrides:
      getRandomWord in class Word
      Returns:
      A conjugated verb chosen randomly from the list, or "undefined" if the list is empty.

    • conjugate

      public String conjugate(String verb)
      Conjugates the provided verb using the current tense strategy.
      Parameters:
      verb - The verb to be conjugated.
      Returns:
      The conjugated form of the provided verb.

    • getTenseStrategy

      public TenseStrategy getTenseStrategy()
      Retrieves the currently assigned TenseStrategy for conjugating verbs.
      Returns:
      the active TenseStrategy used for verb conjugation.

    • configureVerbTense

      public void configureVerbTense(boolean futureTense)
      Configures the verb tense strategy for the Verb class. Adjusts between future tense and present tense strategies based on the input parameter.
      Parameters:
      futureTense - A boolean value indicating if future tense should be applied (true for future, false for present).
